resources.string: Multiple choice questions are 10, True/False questions are 5 points, since you have %50 chance compared to %25 chance. Again, each correct checkbox answer earns you 5 points. And finally, text input question earns you 20 points since you have to type in the answer in correct spelling.

• The real color of the Sun is white.
• Vikings didn't wear horns on their helmets.
• 'Sushi' actually translates to 'Sour Rice'.
• Seasons, indeed cause the Earth's axial tilt.
• Fortune cookies are originated in Japan.
• Actually, Einstein didn't fail at math classes in school.
• Almond and spinach do contain cyanide.
• The name of the insect is 'Cicada'
• 'Black Belt' indicates one's competency at all the basic techniques, in martial arts.
Competency at all the basic techniques
